content: last week i added a new little hat pattern - and i have been really happy with all the lovely comments i have received about it so here is the matching cardigan in 4 sizes ~ large premature/small newborn baby 0 - 3 months 3 - 6 months and 6 9 months requires ~ dk yarn 4mm needles 3 small buttons so sweet **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
